name: Daybreak
description: Shopify theme built on top of the Dawn theme and extended with TailwindCSS and AlpineJS.

scripts.test: for u in / /collections/latest-designs /products/oh-dear-how-sad-never-mind-unisex-t-shirt; do npx lighthouse "https://zfjc82epauiyp0bm-26840891438.shopifypreview.com$u?pb=0" --output-path ./lighthouse.html --view --only-categories performance --extra-headers '{"Cookie":"storefront_digest=d22492f60365515ce1c1135abda6558dad382b1bd455518ac9fc4efaa557444e"}' --budget-path=./budget.json; done
scripts.build: run-p css:build css:critical css:component js:build && npm run sizes:assets
scripts.css:component-purge: for i in ./sections/*-comp.liquid; do f=$(basename $i);x=$(echo $f | cut -f 1 -d '.' | cut -f 1,2 -d '-' );echo $x;npx purgecss --css ./build/component.built.css -o ./assets/$x.comp.css --content $i & done; wait
scripts.css:component-watch: for i in ./sections/*-comp.liquid; do f=$(basename $i);x=$(echo $f | cut -f 1 -d '.' | cut -f 1,2 -d '-' );echo $x;npx tailwindcss -i ./build/component.pre.css --purge $i -o ./assets/$x.comp.css --jit -w & done; wait
scripts.watch: run-p serve css:watch css:component-watch js:watch open
scripts.watch:alpine: nodemon -x 'npm run minify:alpine && npm run minify:js' -w build/alpinescript.js
scripts.replace:rem: for f in ./**/*.liquid; do echo $f; perl -pi -e 's/(\d?\.?\d+)(rem)/($1\/1.6)."rem"/eg' "$f"; done;
